channel.title: engineering on AJ Creates
channel.description: Recent content in engineering on AJ Creates

item.title: Stop Motion Animation
item.description: How to Make a Stop Motion Animation Before you start animating, you’ll need to download the Stop Motion or Stop Motion Pro app to create your animation. You’ll also need to think of a story to be animated. The story can be about practically anything, from fairy tales to a moment of your life. The Setup To setup your animation, you will need to make a good studio to work on it.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hi, I’m AJ! This is my first blog post to check if my setup is okay. I hope to write about some of my projects and interests. Tennis - I am a nationally ranked USTA tennis player and I have played for many years. Books - My favorite genres of books is fantasy and history. History - Reading and analyzing history, especially the history of Egypt and Rome, is one of my favorite things to do and I feel like history is just one big mystery to unravel.
